mainComponent_instruction: Type the given words as fast as you can! Press space key to skip or get the next word!
mainComponent_betterThanAverage: Great, this is better than your average speed! :)
mainComponent_worseThanAverage: This is not as good as your average. Try again! :)
statisticsComponent_firstGame: You haven't played yet. Let's try... :)
helpComponent_description: The aim of this game is to test how fast you can type words. You have one minute to type correctly as many words as you can. Press space to skip or to get the next word. You get 1 point for each correct words and 2 point if the length of the word is more than 10 characters. The game will count the correctly pressed keys as well so your speed will be determined by the correctly pressed keys. At the end of the game you will receive your results and get a badge depending on your typing qualification. If you feel a word too difficult just skip it by pressing space! If you choose hard level then you can skip the word only if you typed correctly at least the first half of it, if extreme level than the actual word will be visible only for a really short time. Good luck! :)
helpComponent_limitWeak: if your speed is less then 50 chars/min
helpComponent_limitNotBad: if your speed is between 50 chars/min and 120 chars/min
helpComponent_limitAverage: if your speed is between 120 chars/min and 200 chars/min
helpComponent_limitGood: if your speed is between 200 chars/min and 300 chars/min
helpComponent_limitPerfect: if your speed is more than 300 chars/min
